vocabulary.english: the most important thing is your safety
vocabulary.example: Alright, the most important thing is your safety.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 好的，最重要的是确保您的安全
vocabulary.originalSentence: Alright, the most important thing is your safety. First, ensure you're okay and if anyone is still inside, please stay out.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 好的，最重要的是确保您的安全。首先，确认您没事，如果家里还有人，请不要进去。

vocabulary.example: Now there's nobody inside.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 目前家里已经没有人了
vocabulary.originalSentence: Now there's nobody inside. I just got home and found the place empty with no one inside, but it's clear someone was there earlier. It's so scary.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 目前家里已经没有人了。我刚到家时发现房里空荡荡的没人，但明显看得出之前有人来过。太吓人了。

vocabulary.example: I see. Please try to keep calm and start from the beginning.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我明白
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. Please try to keep calm and start from the beginning. Can you explain what happened?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白。请尽量保持冷静，从头开始跟我说说到底发生了什么？

vocabulary.example: Okay, I'll try to calm down.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 好的，我尽量平复一下我的情绪吧
vocabulary.originalSentence: Okay, I'll try to calm down. I just got back from a trip and found my home completely ransacked. The laundry room window also got smashed!
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 好的，我尽量平复一下我的情绪吧。我刚刚旅游回来，发现家里被翻得乱七八糟。而且，洗衣房的窗户被砸破了！

vocabulary.example: Oh boy. I haven't had the chance to look over everything in detail since I called you immediately.

vocabulary.originalSentence: Oh boy. I haven't had the chance to look over everything in detail since I called you immediately. However, I noticed the TV is gone, the stereo is gone, and a computer is missing.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 哎呀，我还没来得及细看所有的东西呢，因为我第一时间就打电话给你们了。不过，我发现电视和立体声音响不见了，而且还有一台电脑也没了。

vocabulary.example: Alright, please refrain from tidying up or touching anything at the scene.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 好的，请不要清理或碰动现场的任何东西
vocabulary.originalSentence: Alright, please refrain from tidying up or touching anything at the scene. I'll dispatch an officer to your residence so you can file a report regarding the stolen items.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 好的，请不要清理或碰动现场的任何东西。我会派一名警官到您家，让您报案记录被盗物品的情况。

vocabulary.example: Oh my god. I really can't believe someone would do something like this.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 天啊，我真是难以置信会有人做出这种事
vocabulary.originalSentence: Oh my god. I really can't believe someone would do something like this. Even though I don't have any highly valuable items at home, replacing these things is still a hassle.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 天啊，我真是难以置信会有人做出这种事。虽然我家里没有特别贵重的东西，但要重新买回这些东西还是很麻烦啊。

vocabulary.example: If your home and belongings are insured, your insurance should help cover the cost of replacing the stolen items.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 如果您的房屋和物品都有保险，保险应该可以帮您赔偿更换被盗的物品
vocabulary.originalSentence: If your home and belongings are insured, your insurance should help cover the cost of replacing the stolen items. Also, could you check if anything else is missing?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 如果您的房屋和物品都有保险，保险应该可以帮您赔偿更换被盗的物品。另外，您能再确认一下是否还有别的东西被偷了吗？

vocabulary.example: Oh right! I can't believe I forgot about my insurance!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 对对对，我竟然忘了我还有保险
vocabulary.originalSentence: Oh right! I can't believe I forgot about my insurance! It definitely should help. If possible, I'd prefer to check the entire house carefully after the police arrive.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 对对对，我竟然忘了我还有保险！保险肯定能帮上忙。要是可以的话，我想等警察来了以后，我再详细检查整个房子。

vocabulary.example: Definitely, it's a smart idea to wait inside your car until the police show up so nothing gets disturbed.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 当然，最好是在车里等到警察到达，这样可以确保不破坏现场
vocabulary.originalSentence: Definitely, it's a smart idea to wait inside your car until the police show up so nothing gets disturbed. It won't take much time.

vocabulary.example: Yes, I feel unwell. About a week ago, my daughter started coughing, and now I'm coughing too.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是呀
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, I feel unwell. About a week ago, my daughter started coughing, and now I'm coughing too. I feel like I've caught the same virus.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是呀。我很难受。我女儿大概从一周前就开始咳嗽了，现在我也咳嗽起来了，我感觉我好像也感染了同一种病毒。

vocabulary.example: Oh dear., There's quite a potent virus circulating these days.

vocabulary.originalSentence: Oh dear, there's quite a potent virus circulating these days, and many people have already been hit by it.

vocabulary.example: The doctor said my daughter doesn't need any medication and should just stay home instead of going to school.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 医生说我女儿不用吃药，只要呆在家休息，不去上学就行
vocabulary.originalSentence: The doctor said my daughter doesn't need any medication and should just stay home instead of going to school. She's recovered now, but I'm much sicker than her and feel really awful.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 医生说我女儿不用吃药，只要呆在家休息，不去上学就行。她现在已经恢复了，不过我病得比她严重，感觉特别难受。

vocabulary.example: Well, kids usually bounce back from viral infections more quickly than adults.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 孩子通常比大人更快从病毒感染中恢复
vocabulary.originalSentence: Well, kids usually bounce back from viral infections more quickly than adults. I'm sorry you've caught it too. It's quite unfortunate. This virus can be quite contagious.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 孩子通常比大人更快从病毒感染中恢复。很遗憾你也感染了。太不幸了。这个病毒传染性很强。

vocabulary.example: Yeah, this virus is so contagious.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 没错，这病毒的传染性实在是太强了
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yeah, this virus is so contagious. Could you prescribe some medication to help me feel a bit better?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 没错，这病毒的传染性实在是太强了。你能不能帮我开点药，让我感觉好一点呢？

vocabulary.example: Unfortunately, no medicine can cure a viral infection outright.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 遗憾的是，没有任何药物能直接治愈病毒感染
vocabulary.originalSentence: Unfortunately, no medicine can cure a viral infection outright. The virus usually has to run its course while your body heals on its own, which can take a while.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 遗憾的是，没有任何药物能直接治愈病毒感染。通常病毒需要靠你身体自己恢复，这可能得花一段时间。

vocabulary.example: I feel really terrible; my whole body aches and even lying in bed is painful.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我感觉是实在太糟了，全身酸痛，就连躺在床上也觉得疼
vocabulary.originalSentence: I feel really terrible; my whole body aches and even lying in bed is painful. I also have a fever.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我感觉是实在太糟了，全身酸痛，就连躺在床上也觉得疼。而且，我还发烧了。

vocabulary.example: I understand. Although I can't directly prescribe medicine here.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我明白
vocabulary.originalSentence: I understand. Although I can't directly prescribe medicine here, I can definitely recommend some over-the-counter options that may help lower your fever and let you sleep better.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白。虽然我不能直接给你开药，但我完全可以推荐一些非处方药，它们可能可以帮你退烧，让你睡得更好些。

vocabulary.example: That's great, having a fever is really awful.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 太好了，发烧真是太难熬了
vocabulary.originalSentence: That's great, having a fever is really awful. At first, I felt really cold, and then I broke out in a heavy sweat. It was unbearably hot. Plus, my throat is hurting so badly, it feels like it's being sliced with a knife.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 太好了，发烧真是太难熬了。一开始我觉得特别冷，接着出了好多汗，热得要命。而且我的喉咙也很痛。刀割一样疼。

vocabulary.example: You might try some throat lozenges that might ease your sore throat.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你可以试试含点含片，可能会缓解你的喉咙痛
vocabulary.originalSentence: You might try some throat lozenges that might ease your sore throat. You could also try some steam inhalation, which can help soothe your cough.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你可以试试含点含片，可能会缓解你的喉咙痛。你也可以试试吸蒸汽，有助于缓解咳嗽。

vocabulary.example: Alright, I'll give that a try.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 好的，我试试非常感谢你
vocabulary.originalSentence: Alright, I'll give that a try. Thanks a lot. I really hope I can get better soon. I can't keep staying home and missing work.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 好的，我试试。非常感谢你。我真希望我能快点好，我不能一直待在家里，耽误上班了。

vocabulary.example: Being sick is such a hassle. It always makes you feel terrible. I truly hope to get back to normal as soon as possible.

vocabulary.conversationTitle: Office Meeting on Remote Work Challenges
vocabulary.originalSentence: So far, so good. Although I really miss you all, not having to rush over to the office every day has really saved me a lot of commuting time!
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 目前都挺好的。虽然我很想念你们，但是不用每天跑办公室上班，真的是帮我省了不少的通勤时间啊！

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 没错，越早开始规划越好。而且，最好时不时检查一下计划，因为你的情况和需求一直会变。

vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm not really sure how much money I need to save. I see news and media talking about this, and I'm pretty worried my savings won't cut it.

vocabulary.example: So true. Even if a business has a great system in place, issues still pop up.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 没错就算生意的运营流程很好，还是会出现问题
vocabulary.originalSentence: So true. Even if a business has a great system in place, issues still pop up. And when they do, customers tend to get even more frustrated. Have you run into any tough situations?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 没错。就算生意的运营流程很好，还是会出现问题。一旦有问题，顾客往往会更不高兴。你遇到过难处理的情况吗？

vocabulary.example: Yeah. Someone charged a customer full price for something that was supposed to be discounted.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的有人把本该打折的商品按原价卖给了顾客
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yeah. Someone charged a customer full price for something that was supposed to be discounted. The customer didn't realize it until she got home, and she was really upset.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是的。有人把本该打折的商品按原价卖给了顾客。那位女士回家后才发现，她非常郁闷。

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 完全同意！给整个房子做装饰肯定是件大工程，特别是要选那么多东西，会很有压力。

vocabulary.example: We're taking it one room at a time, so it doesn't feel too overwhelming.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们每次只装饰一个房间，这样不会太赶
vocabulary.originalSentence: We're taking it one room at a time, so it doesn't feel too overwhelming. There's no rush anyway, and this way, we can carefully pick things we really love instead of making impulsive choices.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我们每次只装饰一个房间，这样不会太赶。反正也不赶时间，这样还能慢慢挑喜欢的东西，不会买了又后悔。

vocabulary.example: That's a great approach!

vocabulary.example: I'm decorating my daughter's room right now.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我现在在装饰我女儿的房间
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm decorating my daughter's room right now. She's about to move from her crib to a bigger platform bed—it's crazy how fast she's growing! Feels like just yesterday she was learning to walk!
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我现在在装饰我女儿的房间。她马上要从婴儿床换成大的平台床了。她成长得实在是太快了！感觉昨天她还在学走路呢！

vocabulary.example: Switching to a platform bed is an important milestone!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 换平台床可是个重要的里程碑呀
vocabulary.originalSentence: Switching to a platform bed is an important milestone! There are so many great bed options, and some even come with built-in storage.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 换平台床可是个重要的里程碑呀。现在很多床都不错，有些还带储物功能。

vocabulary.example: Yeah, that would be so convenient!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 对啊，这太方便了
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yeah, that would be so convenient! Storage is a huge deal in a kid's room, so I want to get her a bed that'll last for years, hopefully even into her teenage years.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 对啊，这太方便了！儿童房的储物真的很重要，所以我想买一个能用很多年的床，最好是她能一直睡到青少年时期的。

vocabulary.example: That's a smart choice.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 这个想法很明智，没人想这么快又重新装修，买个耐用的确实更划算。
vocabulary.originalSentence: That's a smart choice. You don't want to redecorate too soon, so getting something that lasts makes a lot of sense.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 这个想法很明智，没人想这么快又重新装修，买个耐用的确实更划算。

vocabulary.example: We feel the same way.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们也这么想
vocabulary.originalSentence: We feel the same way. That's why we go for simple and neutral designs and add some bright colors with easy-to-swap items like rugs.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我们也这么想。所以，我们喜欢简单素净的设计，然后用小地毯这种容易换的小东西来增加一些鲜艳的色彩。

vocabulary.example: I can't wait to see how your place turns out when everything's done. I bet it's going to look fantastic!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我觉得肯定会超级好看
vocabulary.originalSentence: That sounds perfect! I can't wait to see how your place turns out when everything's done. I bet it's going to look fantastic!
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听起来很棒！我特别期待看看你家装好的样子。我觉得肯定会超级好看！

vocabulary.example: I'm looking forward to having you over too!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我也很期待让你过来看看
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm looking forward to having you over too! But it'll probably take a little more time. Taking it slow makes a home feel more inviting—I don't want to rush it.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我也很期待让你过来看看！不过估计还得花点时间。慢慢装饰才能让家更有感觉，我不想匆匆忙忙地搞定它。

vocabulary.example: Good afternoon! Come in and take a seat, please.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 下午好
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good afternoon! Come in and take a seat, please. My co-worker mentioned that you were interested in our volunteer program.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 下午好！请进，坐吧。我同事说你对我们的志愿者项目感兴趣。

vocabulary.example: We're always in need of more volunteers.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们这边总是需要更多志愿者
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: We're always in need of more volunteers. None of our community projects would be possible without the volunteers who dedicate their time.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我们这边总是需要更多志愿者。如果没有这些热心奉献的志愿者，我们的社区项目根本无法实现。

vocabulary.example: I can spare a few hours each week for volunteering, and I'd love to meet more people.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 每周我能抽出几个小时做志愿者，而且也希望能认识更多人
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: I work from home, so my schedule is pretty flexible. I can spare a few hours each week for volunteering, and I'd love to meet more people.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我在家工作，所以时间比较灵活。每周我能抽出几个小时做志愿者，而且也希望能认识更多人。

vocabulary.example: Many of our volunteers end up becoming good friends.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们很多志愿者最后都成了好朋友
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: Many of our volunteers end up becoming good friends. Do you have any specific interests? We can try to match you with a project that suits you.

vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: I have experience trimming branches and know a bit about gardening. Once the park is cleaned up, it'll definitely look beautiful. Plus, it'll give the community a nice green space to enjoy.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我会修剪树枝，也懂一点园艺。公园如果整理好了，肯定会变得很漂亮。而且，它还能给社区添上一块舒适的绿色空间。

vocabulary.example: There's quite a bit of work to do, but I believe the park will look amazing once it's done.

vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park

vocabulary.example: Parks are really important for the whole community.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 公园对整个社区来说真的很重要
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: Parks are really important for the whole community. People need a space where they can take a walk or just sit down and relax in the fresh air.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 公园对整个社区来说真的很重要。人们需要一个可以散步的地方，或者只是坐下来放松一下，享受新鲜空气。

vocabulary.example: I'm really happy to be a part of the project and help improve the park.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我很高兴能参与这个项目，帮助改善公园的环境
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Helping Hands for a Neighbourhood Park
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm really happy to be a part of the project and help improve the park. It's not just about making it look nicer—it'll also make the whole neighbourhood a better place to live.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我很高兴能参与这个项目，帮助改善公园的环境。这不仅能让公园更漂亮，还能让整个社区变得更适合居住。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 下午好

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 下午好！请进，请坐。我收到了你发的邮件，说你想跟我见面。

vocabulary.example: Hello. Yes, thank you for taking the time to see me.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 您好。是的。谢谢您抽时间见我。

vocabulary.example: I try to leave some free time available each day for students. I hope your studies are going well.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 希望你学习进展顺利
vocabulary.originalSentence: That's totally fine. I try to leave some free time available each day for students. I hope your studies are going well.

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你论文成绩不理想的原因在于文章的结构
vocabulary.originalSentence: The reason your paper isn't as good as it could be is the structure of your essay. Your ideas are fine, but the paper lacks a clear logical flow.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你论文成绩不理想的原因在于文章的结构。你的观点没问题，但论文缺乏清晰的逻辑性。

vocabulary.example: Oh. There were indeed a few parts in my paper that I wrote in the final minutes, so they ended up a bit rushed.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 哦我的论文里确实有几个部分是最后几分钟才写的，所以写得比较仓促
vocabulary.originalSentence: Oh. There were indeed a few parts in my paper that I wrote in the final minutes, so they ended up a bit rushed. I was worried that I wouldn't cover all the requirements of the topic.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 哦。我的论文里确实有几个部分是最后几分钟才写的，所以写得比较仓促。我担心涵盖不了题目的所有要求。

vocabulary.example: I see. That might explain why your arguments aren't set up well.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我明白了这或许能解释为什么你的论点组织得不够好
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. That might explain why your arguments aren't set up well. It's often not a good idea to keep reworking your paper.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白了。这或许能解释为什么你的论点组织得不够好。不断地反复修改论文往往不是个好主意。

vocabulary.example: How have you been recently?
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 最近怎么样
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning, it's nice to see you. How have you been recently?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 早上好，很高兴见到你。最近怎么样？
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: Good morning, it's nice to see you. | How have you been recently?

vocabulary.example: Recently, I've been frequently visiting my mother because her health hasn't been good. That's why I'm really tired.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我最近因为要经常去看望我母亲，她身体不太好所以我很累
vocabulary.originalSentence: Hello, I'm also very glad to see you. Recently, I've been frequently visiting my mother because her health hasn't been good. That's why I'm really tired.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你好，我也很高兴能见到你。我最近因为要经常去看望我母亲，她身体不太好。所以我很累。

vocabulary.example: I remember you once said that she has not been well recently.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我记得你曾经说过她最近身体不太好
vocabulary.originalSentence: I remember you once said that she has not been well recently. You must have spent several hours going back and forth to her house, right?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我记得你曾经说过她最近身体不太好。你肯定花了好几个小时来回跑她家，对吧？

vocabulary.example: Yes, it takes a lot of time.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的，要花很多时间
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, it takes a lot of time. I have to visit her every week and also work, so I hardly have time to do anything else.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是的，要花很多时间。我每周都要去看她，还得工作，几乎没时间做其他事情。

vocabulary.example: That sounds very difficult.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 听起来真不容易我听说你可以找社工聊聊
vocabulary.originalSentence: That sounds very difficult. I heard that you might talk to a social worker. They could help you find services suitable for your mother so that visiting her won't be so tiring.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听起来真不容易。我听说你可以找社工聊聊。他们可能会帮你看看有没有适合你母亲的服务，这样探望她就不会那么辛苦了。

vocabulary.originalSentence: Good idea, I didn't know I could find such help. Where can I get the contact information of a social worker?

vocabulary.example: There are social worker associations.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 有一些社工协会你可以在网上和社交媒体上找到他们的服务
vocabulary.originalSentence: There are social worker associations. You can find their services online and on social media. You can also locate social workers near your mom's home. There are online directories available.

vocabulary.example: Yes. Since these are professional organizations, you can find their names listed in directories.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的由于这些是专业机构，你可以在名录上查到他们的名字
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes. Since these are professional organizations, you can find their names listed in directories. Elder care is a sensitive matter, so it's important to find someone qualified.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是的。由于这些是专业机构，你可以在名录上查到他们的名字。养老问题很敏感，所以找到有资质的人很重要。

vocabulary.example: Thank you for the information; it's really helpful.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 感谢你的信息，真的很有帮助

vocabulary.example: We always want to live closer to her.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们一直想住得离她近点
vocabulary.originalSentence: We always want to live closer to her. Before she got sick, we were already looking at houses and planning to buy one. But after she fell ill, our house-hunting plans were put on hold.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我们一直想住得离她近点。在她生病之前，我们就开始看房和准备买房了。但她生病以后，看房计划就搁置了。

vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, they can bring their own lunch. The museum has a courtyard where students can eat. They also offer lunch. After lunch, students can walk around before the afternoon session starts.

vocabulary.example: Well, trauma insurance generally excludes pre-existing conditions.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 嗯，创伤保险一般不保既往病
vocabulary.originalSentence: Well, trauma insurance generally excludes pre-existing conditions. So, if you already have any pre-existing conditions covered by your current policy, that particular condition won't be covered under trauma insurance.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 嗯，创伤保险一般不保既往病。所以，如果你有什么既往病，现保单也承保，那创伤保险里不会赔付的。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我明白了。这不是个好时机啊，我希望他们不是负责新产品的关键项目。

vocabulary.example: My father cut his leg last month, and it got infected; his wound needs regular dressing changes.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我父亲上个月割伤了腿，感染了，伤口需要换药
vocabulary.originalSentence: My father cut his leg last month, and it got infected; his wound needs regular dressing changes. That's why we come to the clinic regularly.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我父亲上个月割伤了腿，感染了，伤口需要换药。这就是我们定期来诊所的原因。

vocabulary.example: I'm a construction worker, working on a site.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我是建筑工人，在工地上班
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm a construction worker, working on a site. My car parked at the site was broken into, and all my tools were stolen. I just can't believe it.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我是建筑工人，在工地上班。我停在工地的车被撬了，工具全被偷了。我简直不敢相信。

vocabulary.example: Tools, especially power tools, are always common targets for thieves since they can sell them online or to shops.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 工具，尤其是电动工具，总是小偷盯上的常见目标，因为他们可以把工具在网上卖掉，或者卖给商店
vocabulary.originalSentence: Sorry to hear that. Tools, especially power tools, are always common targets for thieves since they can sell them online or to shops.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听到这个消息我感到非常抱歉。工具，尤其是电动工具，总是小偷盯上的常见目标，因为他们可以把工具在网上卖掉，或者卖给商店。

vocabulary.example: If the thief sells them to shops, the police might trace them.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 如果小偷把他们卖到商店，警察可能会找到，和其他人一样，我在上面刻了信息
vocabulary.originalSentence: If the thief sells them to shops, the police might trace them. Like many others, I had my details engraved on them. Will that help tracking/ Will that help with the investigation?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 如果小偷把他们卖到商店，警察可能会找到，和其他人一样，我在上面刻了信息。这样能帮助追查吗？

vocabulary.example: Excellent precaution!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 这个预防措施很好能大大提高找回几率
vocabulary.originalSentence: Excellent precaution! This significantly improves recovery chances. We'll do our best to investigate the incident and recover your property if possible.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 这个预防措施很好。能大大提高找回几率。我们会尽力调查此事，并在可能的情况下追回您的财物。

vocabulary.example: It's great that I have insurance; even if nothing is recovered, I can still file a claim with my insurer.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我买了保险是很好的即使没有找到，也可以向保险公司申请理赔
vocabulary.originalSentence: It's great that I have insurance; even if nothing is recovered, I can still file a claim with my insurer. My insurance covers theft losses, but I need a case number to initiate the claim.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我买了保险是很好的。即使没有找到，也可以向保险公司申请理赔。我的保险涵盖盗窃损失，但需要案件编号，才能启动理赔。

vocabulary.example: Yes. We still need more details about the crime.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的，我们还需要更多关于案件的细节
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes. We still need more details about the crime. Please provide any additional information you can remember. Then I'll fill out the official report and email it to you for your claim.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是的，我们还需要更多关于案件的细节。请把你能记得的其他信息提供给我，然后我会把正式报案记录填写好，并通过邮件发给你，好让你申请理赔。

vocabulary.example: Hi! Moving to a new country is indeed a big challenge for a family.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你好啊搬到一个新国家，对一个家庭来说，确实是个很大的挑战
vocabulary.originalSentence: Hi! Moving to a new country is indeed a big challenge for a family, but we really love it here.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你好啊！搬到一个新国家，对一个家庭来说，确实是个很大的挑战。不过，我们真的很喜欢这里。

vocabulary.example: Even though I'm not familiar with this place, we're very excited.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 即使我不熟悉这里，我们很兴奋，我想，等我们找到新朋友，孩子们也去上学了，我们就会觉得这边的生活舒适自由。
vocabulary.originalSentence: Even though I'm not familiar with this place, we're very excited. I think once we make new friends and the kids start school, we'll feel that life here is comfortable and free.

vocabulary.example: Back in my home country I had a garden, and now I want to buy some seeds.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我在自己国家有一个花园，我想买点种子，你觉得哪种种子好？
vocabulary.originalSentence: Back in my home country I had a garden, and now I want to buy some seeds. Which kind do you think is good?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我在自己国家有一个花园，我想买点种子，你觉得哪种种子好？

vocabulary.example: It depends on the weather.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 这要看天气，有些种子长得特别好
vocabulary.originalSentence: It depends on the weather. Some seeds grow very well. You can ask one of our neighbours.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 这要看天气，有些种子长得特别好。你可以问问我们的邻居。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: It depends on the weather. | Some seeds grow very well. You can ask one of our neighbours.

vocabulary.example: Ah, alright. I haven't met him yet.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 啊，那好的我还没见过他呢
vocabulary.originalSentence: Ah, alright. I haven't met him yet. If I want to talk with him about gardening and knock on his door, would that be too forward? Do you think he'd mind?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 啊，那好的。我还没见过他呢。如果我想跟他聊聊园艺的事儿，去敲他的门，会不会冒昧啊？他会介意吗？

vocabulary.example: I'm so happy to be able to grow vegetables here. Continuing my passion for gardening makes me look forward to my new life.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 能继续园艺的爱好，也让我对新生活充满了期待
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thank you, I really appreciate your help. I'm so happy to be able to grow vegetables here. Continuing my passion for gardening makes me look forward to my new life.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢，我很感激你的帮忙，我很高兴能在这里种菜。能继续园艺的爱好，也让我对新生活充满了期待。

vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning! Thanks for calling Photography Moments. This is Penny speaking
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 早上好！感谢致电"摄影时刻"，我是佩妮。

vocabulary.example: Hi Penny, I'd like to book a photoshoot.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你好，佩妮，我想预约拍一些照片
vocabulary.originalSentence: Hi Penny, I'd like to book a photoshoot. Someone recommended you to me and said you're an amazing family photographer.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你好，佩妮，我想预约拍一些照片。有人向我推荐了你，说你是很棒的家庭摄影师。

vocabulary.example: That's lovely to hear!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 真高兴听到这个
vocabulary.originalSentence: That's lovely to hear! Many of my clients come back to capture different moments in their lives.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 真高兴听到这个！我的很多客户都会回来，记录他们人生中的不同时刻。

vocabulary.example: I think it's great to work with a photographer long-term.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我觉得和一个摄影师长期合作是很好的
vocabulary.originalSentence: I think it's great to work with a photographer long-term. I believe working with someone over time is really beneficial. Photos are so important—without them, it's hard to remember many of life's important moments.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我觉得和一个摄影师长期合作是很好的。我认为和别人一起工作一段时间也是很好的。照片很重要，没有照片的话，很难记住很多人生重要时刻。

vocabulary.example: My dear grandmother is almost 100 years old.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我的好祖母快100岁了，我想给她拍一些照片，庆祝她的生日。
vocabulary.originalSentence: My dear grandmother is almost 100 years old, and I'd like to have her photographed to celebrate her birthday.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我的好祖母快100岁了，我想给她拍一些照片，庆祝她的生日。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: My dear grandmother is almost 100 years old. | And I'd like to have her photographed to celebrate her birthday.

vocabulary.example: Wow! What a fabulous milestone!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 哇这可是一个了不起的里程碑/大事啊
vocabulary.originalSentence: Wow! What a fabulous milestone! That's a wonderful way to celebrate her birthday. Would you like to include other family members in the photos?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 哇！这可是一个了不起的里程碑/大事啊！用这种方式庆祝她的生日可太棒了。你想让其他家人一起入镜吗？

vocabulary.example: But recently, I've been having a water pooling problem, and it's getting worse.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 但是最近遇到了积水问题，而且情况越来越糟了
vocabulary.originalSentence: I've been living in this house for two years, and it had always been fine. But recently, I've been having a water pooling problem, and it's getting worse.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我住在这个房子里两年了，之前一直都没问题。但是最近遇到了积水问题，而且情况越来越糟了。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我刚来到澳大利亚，不熟悉用水限制
vocabulary.originalSentence: I just came to Australia, and I'm not familiar with the water restrictions. My neighbor said it has something to do with low rainfall.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我刚来到澳大利亚，不熟悉用水限制。我邻居说这跟降雨量不足有关。

vocabulary.example: Yes, that's right. Because of low rainfall, we need to conserve water.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 没错，因为降雨量不足，我们需要节约用水
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, that's right. Because of low rainfall, we need to conserve water. That means there are certain rules about how and when you can use it at home.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 没错，因为降雨量不足，我们需要节约用水。这意味着家里用水会有一些规则，关于怎么用水和什么时候用水。

vocabulary.example: I see. That makes a lot of sense.

vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. That makes a lot of sense. In my country, we have monsoons, droughts, and floods. Those are even worse than low rainfall. I know the situation is different in Australia.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白了。那很有道理。在我的国家，我们有季风，干旱，洪水。这些甚至比降水量少更严重，我知道在澳大利亚的情况不一样。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 这些甚至比降水量少更严重，我知道在澳大利亚的情况不一样
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. That makes a lot of sense. In my country, we have monsoons, droughts, and floods. Those are even worse than low rainfall. I know the situation is different in Australia.

vocabulary.originalSentence: But when it's really hot and dry, my lawn and garden get affected. Am I allowed to water them?

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 尽管一些性格温顺的大狗很适合作伴，但它们可能不太适合老人或者行动不便的人。一只小狗可能会更合适。

vocabulary.example: Small dogs are easier to walk.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 小狗更容易遛
vocabulary.originalSentence: Small dogs are easier to walk. I saw a fluffy little dog on your poster.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 小狗更容易遛。我在你们的海报上看到了一只毛茸茸的小狗。

vocabulary.example: Yes, I know which dog you're talking about.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 对，我知道你说的是哪只狗
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, I know which dog you're talking about. It's well-behaved and would be a good fit for you and your father.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 对，我知道你说的是哪只狗。它很乖，应该很适合你和你父亲。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 太棒了我想领养它我需要办理什么手续
vocabulary.originalSentence: This is amazing! I want to adopt it. What paperwork do I need to complete? I'm not too familiar with the process, but I'm really happy to do this.

vocabulary.example: You need to fill out an application form first.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你需要先填写一份申请表
vocabulary.originalSentence: You need to fill out an application form first. Once that's done, we will conduct a home visit to ensure your living environment is suitable for a dog.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你需要先填写一份申请表。填好后，我们会进行一次家访，来确保你的居住环境是适合养狗的。

vocabulary.example: Good morning, welcome.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 早上好，欢迎
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning, welcome. I believe you're here for some information about voting in Australia.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 早上好，欢迎。我想您是来了解澳大利亚的投票信息的吧。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 可不是嘛

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 可不是嘛。我知道全国大选没多久了，我想知道我能不能投票。

vocabulary.example: You can enroll to vote if you're a citizen and over 18 years old.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 如果您是公民，并且年满18岁，就可以登记投票。
vocabulary.originalSentence: You can enroll to vote if you're a citizen and over 18 years old.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 如果您是公民，并且年满18岁，就可以登记投票。

vocabulary.example: I'm definitely over 18!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我当然不止18岁了，我去年6月份成为了澳大利亚公民，我还有护照。
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm definitely over 18! I became an Australian citizen last June, and I have my passport.

vocabulary.example: Great. You must also have lived at your current address for more than one month in order to vote.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 很好。您还需要在现住址居住超过一个月，才可以投票。
vocabulary.originalSentence: Great. You must also have lived at your current address for more than one month in order to vote.

vocabulary.example: Before you can vote, you have to include your name on the roll.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 在投票之前，您需要把名字加入选民名单
vocabulary.originalSentence: Before you can vote, you have to include your name on the roll. You can enroll online using your passport as proof of identity.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 在投票之前，您需要把名字加入选民名单。您可以通过护照在网上登记，作为身份证明。

vocabulary.example: That sounds like the easiest way.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 听起来这是最容易的办法
vocabulary.originalSentence: That sounds like the easiest way. I'd like to know about other methods to enrol. Sometimes, the internet where I live has issues, so I can't get online.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听起来这是最容易的办法。我还想了解其他注册方法，有时候因为我住的地方的网络问题，我没办法上网。

vocabulary.example: You can print the enrollment form from the election website, and then mail or email it to the election office.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 您可以从选举网站打印注册表，然后邮寄或电邮给选举办公室
vocabulary.originalSentence: You can print the enrollment form from the election website, and then mail or email it to the election office. Or you can visit the election office and enrol in person.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 您可以从选举网站打印注册表，然后邮寄或电邮给选举办公室。您也可以亲自到选举办公室注册。

vocabulary.example: Thank you, I have more options now.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 谢谢，现在我有更多选择了
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thank you, I have more options now. I'll enrol as soon as possible. I don't want to miss voting, and the election is only a few months away.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢，现在我有更多选择了。我会尽早注册，我不想错过投票，离大选已经没几个月了。

vocabulary.example: By law, Australian citizens must vote, or you'll be fined if you don't.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 根据法律，澳大利亚公民必须投票，否则会被罚款
vocabulary.originalSentence: By law, Australian citizens must vote, or you'll be fined if you don't. You're doing the right thing by enrolling early.

vocabulary.example: I really hope everyone can come to her engagement party.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我希望，大家都能来她的订婚仪式
vocabulary.originalSentence: I really hope everyone can come to her engagement party. We sent the invitations out early because we need some time to prepare. I really hope you can make it.

vocabulary.example: She does want a formal ceremony.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 她确实想要一个正式的仪式
vocabulary.originalSentence: She does want a formal ceremony. She hopes everyone will dress up, or at least wear something a bit formal. She's thinking of having a cocktail party, not a sit-down banquet.

vocabulary.example: I've been thinking about whether we could ask local businesses for donations to collect some items for sale. I also want to get them involved in organizing community events to raise more funds.

vocabulary.example: I currently hold a Working Holiday Visa.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我现在持有打工度假签证
vocabulary.originalSentence: I currently hold a Working Holiday Visa. I really enjoy my life in Australia. It's truly a wonderful place. I hope to be able to live here permanently.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我现在持有打工度假签证。我很享受在澳大利亚的生活。这里真的是个好地方。我希望我能在这里永久的生活下去。

vocabulary.example: My friend is getting married next month.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我的朋友下个月要结婚了
vocabulary.originalSentence: My friend is getting married next month. I would like to go back to attend her wedding. However, I'm not sure if I can do that.

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 听起来很令人兴奋! 打工度假签证是允许您多次往返澳大利亚的。

vocabulary.example: I want to earn some extra money to travel around Australia.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我想多挣点钱去环游澳大利亚

vocabulary.example: How can I help you with your legal matter today? We're here to support you, so feel free to share any details you're comfortable with.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 今天我能如何帮助您解决您的法律问题呢我们在这里为您提供帮助，您可以分享您愿意透露的任何细节
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning. Thanks for calling our law firm. How can I help you with your legal matter today? We're here to support you, so feel free to share any details you're comfortable with.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 早上好，感谢您致电我们律师事务所。今天我能如何帮助您解决您的法律问题呢？我们在这里为您提供帮助，您可以分享您愿意透露的任何细节。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 早上好我需要咨询一些法律建议
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning. I need some legal advice. Your website mentions that you specialize in helping small business owners, and it seems like your reputation is quite good.

vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是这样的：我有一家小型零售店，雇佣了三名员工。但我决定要卖掉这个生意。我不得不说，这是一个艰难的决定。

vocabulary.example: I see. I can assist you with the legal aspects of selling your business, if you'd like.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我明白了如果您愿意，我可以帮您处理卖生意的法律事务
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. I can assist you with the legal aspects of selling your business, if you'd like. Additionally, I can help you make any adjustments regarding staffing.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白了。如果您愿意，我可以帮您处理卖生意的法律事务。此外，我还可以帮助您在员工安排上做任何调整。

vocabulary.example: Thank you. I need your help drafting a sales contract.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 谢谢我需要您帮我起草一份买卖合同
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thank you. I need your help drafting a sales contract. I just found a buyer. Things are moving much faster than I expected, and my organizational skills aren't very strong.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢。我需要您帮我起草一份买卖合同。我刚刚找到一个买家。事情发生的比我预想的要快很多。而且，我的组织能力不是很好。

vocabulary.example: Two of the employees have already found new jobs, and I'm quite happy about that.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 其中的两位员工，已经找到新工作了
vocabulary.originalSentence: Two of the employees have already found new jobs, and I'm quite happy about that. The third employee is preparing to retire.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 其中的两位员工，已经找到新工作了。我对此感觉到很高兴。第三位员工准备退休了。

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 那对你们所有人来说都会是一个很好的结果

vocabulary.example: Thank you. Ever since I started my business, my employees have been working for me.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 谢谢你自从我开业以来，我的员工就一直在为我工作
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thank you. Ever since I started my business, my employees have been working for me. I've never dealt with resignations or terminations before.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢你。自从我开业以来，我的员工就一直在为我工作。我从来没有处理过辞职或者解雇的问题。

vocabulary.example: You must be a really good boss!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 您一定是个很好的老板
vocabulary.originalSentence: You must be a really good boss! And it sounds you've had a stable team. We can work on the sales contract and the employment contracts at the same time. There's a lot to take care of.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 您一定是个很好的老板！而且听起来您的团队很稳定。我们可以同时处理销售合同和劳动合同。要做的事情很多。

vocabulary.example: Thanks for the compliment!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 谢谢你的夸奖我尽量做好
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thanks for the compliment! I tried my best. Yes, I also have a lot of inventory and equipment that need to be included in the sales contract. It is a bit complicated, but I believe things can be done smoothly with your help.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢你的夸奖。我尽量做好。是的，我还有很多存货和设备，也需要包含在这个卖生意的合同里。事情确实有点复杂，但我相信在你的帮助下，可以顺利进行。

vocabulary.example: Of course. I'm here to guide you through every step of the process.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 当然可以我会在每一步过程中指导你
vocabulary.originalSentence: Of course. I'm here to guide you through every step of the process. Why don't we schedule a time to organize your contracts? If that works for you, we can meet tomorrow at 2 PM.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 当然可以。我会在每一步过程中指导你。我们约个时间把你的合同整理一下怎么样？如果你觉得合适，我们可以明天下午2点见。

vocabulary.example: That's great! I really appreciate you helping me arrange all of this.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 那太好了我很感激你能帮我安排这一切
vocabulary.originalSentence: That's great! I really appreciate you helping me arrange all of this. I feel like working with you will make things much easier for me. So, see you tomorrow! I'm looking forward to meeting you and getting started on this work.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 那太好了！我很感激你能帮我安排这一切。感觉跟你合作会让我轻松很多。那我们明天见啦。我很期待跟您见面并且开始进行这些工作。

vocabulary.example: Hello, please come in and take a seat!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你好，请进, 请坐很开心见到你
vocabulary.originalSentence: Hello, please come in and take a seat! I'm glad to see you. I've been wanting to ask you: how is your daughter doing at her new school?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你好，请进, 请坐！很开心见到你。我一直想问你呢：你女儿在新学校过得怎么样?

vocabulary.example: I'm really glad you called to ask me.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我非常高兴您打电话问我
vocabulary.originalSentence: I'm really glad you called to ask me. I've been wanting to set up a time to meet with you and chat.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我非常高兴您打电话问我。我一直想约时间跟您见一面，聊一聊。

vocabulary.example: You mentioned before that changing schools was a good thing for your daughter.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 你之前跟我说, 你感觉换学校对你女儿来说很好，但好像现在她遇到了一些问题。
vocabulary.originalSentence: You mentioned before that changing schools was a good thing for your daughter, but it seems she's encountering some issues now.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 你之前跟我说, 你感觉换学校对你女儿来说很好，但好像现在她遇到了一些问题。

vocabulary.example: Yes, her grades have improved since the transfer.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的，转学以后，她的成绩有提高
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, her grades have improved since the transfer. However, she seems to be having some difficulties socially. She still hasn't made any new friends.

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 她在她以前的学校参加了乐队的

vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我认为学校乐队是很好的想法

vocabulary.example: How about we organize a gathering one afternoon next weekend?
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 下周末，我们找一个下午，举办一个聚会吧
vocabulary.originalSentence: How about we organize a gathering one afternoon next weekend? It would be a great opportunity for everyone to meet, and we can have some snacks and drinks.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 下周末，我们找一个下午，举办一个聚会吧？这样可以有一个不错的机会，让大家可以互相见见面，还可以吃点东西，喝点东西。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: How about we organize a gathering one afternoon next weekend? | It would be a great opportunity for everyone to meet, and we can have some snacks and drinks.
vocabulary.chineseDelimiterVersion: 下周末，我们找一个下午，举办一个聚会吧 | 这样可以有一个不错的机会，让大家可以互相见见面，还可以吃点东西，喝点东西

vocabulary.example: It sounds fantastic.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 听起来很棒我觉得组织这个聚会不会太难
vocabulary.originalSentence: It sounds fantastic. I think it won't be too difficult to organize this gathering. We can just do it casually. Let's do it next weekend.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听起来很棒！我觉得组织这个聚会不会太难。我们可以随意点。我们就下周末搞吧。

vocabulary.example: Great. I think the most important thing now is to let everyone know that they're welcome to join that afternoon if they are free.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 好的我想，现在最重要的事情是，我们可以告诉大家，那天下午有空了就可以来参加
vocabulary.originalSentence: Great. I think the most important thing now is to let everyone know that they're welcome to join that afternoon if they are free. It doesn't need to be too formal.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 好的。我想，现在最重要的事情是，我们可以告诉大家，那天下午有空了就可以来参加。不需要太正式。

vocabulary.example: I still have the decorations from my last party.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我还有上次聚会的装饰品
vocabulary.originalSentence: I still have the decorations from my last party. We can use them. I don't think we need music at the gathering. After all, our main goal is to chat and connect with each other.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我还有上次聚会的装饰品。我们可以用它们。我觉得聚会不需要音乐，毕竟我们的主要目的是聊天和互相认识。

vocabulary.example: Exactly. The most important thing is to let everyone know that the gathering is coming up.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 没错最重要的事情是让大家知道聚会即将举行
vocabulary.originalSentence: Exactly. The most important thing is to let everyone know that the gathering is coming up. We should send out the invitations as soon as possible.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 没错。最重要的事情是让大家知道聚会即将举行。我们要尽快发邀请函。

vocabulary.example: That sounds really exciting!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 听起来真令人激动一旦邀请函准备好了，记得告诉我
vocabulary.originalSentence: That sounds really exciting! Once the invitations are ready, do let me know. I'll help you deliver them to everyone. And if I run into them, I'll be sure to mention it as well.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 听起来真令人激动！一旦邀请函准备好了，记得告诉我。我帮你发给大家。如果我遇到他们，我也会告诉他们这件事的。

vocabulary.example: I enjoy cooking, and I'd be happy to prepare some food.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我喜欢烹饪我很乐意准备食物
vocabulary.originalSentence: I enjoy cooking, and I'd be happy to prepare some food. I might not plan anything special, just some snacks.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我喜欢烹饪。我很乐意准备食物。我可能没有计划做什么特别的食物，就准备一些小吃吧。

vocabulary.example: We could go to the supermarket to get some supplies and drinks.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我们可以去超市买一些材料和喝的东西
vocabulary.originalSentence: We could go to the supermarket to get some supplies and drinks. I can't wait to make my favorite iced lemon tea.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我们可以去超市买一些材料和喝的东西。我迫不及待想做我最爱的冰镇柠檬茶了。

vocabulary.example: That sounds great! Thank you! This is going to be so much fun!
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 太好了谢谢你这一定会很有趣
vocabulary.originalSentence: That sounds great! Thank you! This is going to be so much fun! I'm really looking forward to getting to know my new neighbors through this event.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 太好了！谢谢你！这一定会很有趣！我很期待通过这个活动更了解我的新邻居们。

vocabulary.example: I saw on your website that you specialize in providing legal advice for small businesses.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我看到你们的网站上说，你们专门针对小生意提供法律建议
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: Good morning. I need some legal advice. I saw on your website that you specialize in providing legal advice for small businesses.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 早上好。我需要咨询一些法律建议。我看到你们的网站上说，你们专门针对小生意提供法律建议。

vocabulary.example: Yes, that's correct.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 是的，没错我们给商家提供商业和雇佣方面的法律建议
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, that's correct. We provide business owners with advice on commercial and employment matters. Why do you need legal advice?
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 是的，没错。我们给商家提供商业和雇佣方面的法律建议。您为什么需要法律建议呢？

vocabulary.example: Here is the thing: I have a small business with three employees, but I want to sell the business now.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 事情是这样的：我有一个小生意和三个雇员，但我现在想要卖掉这个生意
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: Here is the thing: I have a small business with three employees, but I want to sell the business now. It's a tough decision.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 事情是这样的：我有一个小生意和三个雇员，但我现在想要卖掉这个生意。这是一个很艰难的决定。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: Here is the thing: I have a small business with three employees, but I want to sell the business now. | It's a tough decision.

vocabulary.example: However, you will need to handle the arrangements for the employees yourself.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 然而，您需要自己处理员工的安排
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. I can help you with the legal aspects of selling your business, if you like. However, you will need to handle the arrangements for the employees yourself.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 我明白了。如果您愿意，我可以帮助您处理出售生意的法律事务。然而，您需要自己处理员工的安排。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: I see. I can help you with the legal aspects of selling your business, if you like. | However, you will need to handle the arrangements for the employees yourself.

vocabulary.example: Thank you. I need your help to draft the sales agreement.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 谢谢我需要您帮我起草卖生意的协议
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: Thank you. I need your help to draft the sales agreement. I have already found a buyer, but my organizational skills are not very strong.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 谢谢。我需要您帮我起草卖生意的协议。我已经找到买家了，但我的组织能力不是很好。
vocabulary.delimiterVersion: Thank you. I need your help to draft the sales agreement. | I have already found a buyer, but my organizational skills are not very strong.

vocabulary.example: Congratulations! I can help you draft the agreement.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 恭喜我可以帮助您起草合同
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: Congratulations! I can help you draft the agreement. That won't be a problem. When you need to terminate the employment contracts, I can help with that as well.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 恭喜！我可以帮助您起草合同。没问题的。您需要终止员工合同的时候，我也可以帮忙。

vocabulary.example: No, the employees want to continue working for the new buyer.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 不，员工希望继续为新买家工作
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: No, the employees want to continue working for the new buyer. The buyer has agreed, and I hope they all find a good place.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 不，员工希望继续为新买家工作。买家已经同意了，我也希望他们都能有个好去处。

vocabulary.example: I will prepare a conditional sales agreement, which will also provide legal protection for the employees.
vocabulary.exampleChinese: 我会起草一份附带条件的出售协议，让员工也能获得法律保护
vocabulary.conversationTitle: Legal Consultation for Selling a Small Business
vocabulary.originalSentence: That would be a good outcome for all of you. I will prepare a conditional sales agreement, which will also provide legal protection for the employees.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 那对你们所有人来说都会是一个很好的结果。我会起草一份附带条件的出售协议，让员工也能获得法律保护。

vocabulary.example: Yes, it is. People love to live here.

vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, it is. People love to live here. There are many shops and restaurants in this area. The parks are beautiful and very close to the beach.

vocabulary.originalSentence: Welcome to Australia. I believe it would be challenging to move to a new country, as many things are quite different.
vocabulary.originalChineseSentence: 欢迎来到澳大利亚。我相信搬到一个新国家会很有挑战，因为许多事情都很不同。

vocabulary.originalSentence: Yes, indeed. Many things are very different. It would be very helpful to find a good place to live. If possible, I would like to register for a house or an apartment.

vocabulary.conversationTitle: Rental Inquiry at the Council Office
vocabulary.originalSentence: I see. That's totally different here. In general, the Council can't provide rental properties and can't help people rent properties.
